name: Signal Junior Toothbrush
description: Rounded soft Dupont Tynex bristles will not damage the delicate gums of your child. A small brush head which allows a thorough cleaning of hard to reach areas. A rounded brush handle which facilitates safe driving of the toothbrush and good grip. A 'Plip Plop' sucker which stick on damp surfaces and provide extra fun for kids. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
